name: part_008
file: tmp_【 チラ見せ】大神ミオ 1st Live.「Our Sparkle」ぴあアリーナMM [pChQkIDyOJA]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_008.mov

scenes.description: Ookami Mio performs the song "Our Sparkle" on stage with backup dancers and intense lighting effects.
MC section where Ookami Mio thanks the audience, performs her self-introduction call-and-response, and talks about her new solo live outfit.

subtitles.original: 君と思いを抱いて
subtitles.english: Embracing thoughts of you

subtitles.original: 止まらないで
subtitles.english: Please don't stop

subtitles.original: 走り続ける君を知るから
subtitles.english: Because I know you continue to run

subtitles.original: きっと未来は色に溢れ
subtitles.english: I'm sure the future will overflow with colors

subtitles.original: まだ見ぬ世界をカラフルに染める
subtitles.english: Coloring the world I haven't seen yet

subtitles.original: もっと自由になりたいから
subtitles.english: Because I want to become even freer

subtitles.original: ずっとずっとずっと夢見てるの
subtitles.english: I'm always, always, always dreaming

subtitles.original: 空に光る星のように
subtitles.english: Like a star shining in the sky

subtitles.original: 輝きたいと願う夜
subtitles.english: On the nights I wish to shine

subtitles.original: 広い世界に存在を
subtitles.english: To prove my existence

subtitles.original: 証明したくて
subtitles.english: To the vast world

subtitles.original: できないことばかり数えても
subtitles.english: Even if I only count what I can't do

subtitles.original: 胸が苦しくなるだけでしょう
subtitles.english: It will only make my heart ache, right?

subtitles.original: 私だって絶対
subtitles.english: Even I will surely

subtitles.original: あの日の夢のようになれるはず
subtitles.english: Be able to become like the dream from that day

subtitles.original: 響く音色の中ほら
subtitles.english: Look, amidst the echoing tones

subtitles.original: 未知なる景色
subtitles.english: An unknown scenery

subtitles.original: 遠く感じてたのに
subtitles.english: Though I felt it was far away

subtitles.original: 気付いた気がしてたんだ
subtitles.english: I felt like I had noticed it

subtitles.original: そっと伸ばしたこの手の先
subtitles.english: Beyond this hand I gently extended

subtitles.original: 描いた理想が側を越える
subtitles.english: The ideal I drew crosses by me

subtitles.original: きっと見つける私の色
subtitles.english: I'll surely find my color

subtitles.original: ずっとずっとずっと追いかけるの
subtitles.english: I'll always, always, always chase it

subtitles.original: 限りなく透明だった
subtitles.english: Everything that was

subtitles.original: 瞳に映る全て
subtitles.english: Infinitely transparent in my eyes

subtitles.original: 変わり行く世界のリズム
subtitles.english: The rhythm of the changing world

subtitles.original: モノクロを染めて行く
subtitles.english: Dyes the monochrome

subtitles.original: 閉じ込めなくてもいいの
subtitles.english: It's okay not to lock it away

subtitles.original: 不安感じても
subtitles.english: Even if I feel anxious

subtitles.original: 私だけの色で描こう
subtitles.english: Let's paint with only my own color

subtitles.original: きっと未来は色に溢れ
subtitles.english: I'm sure the future will overflow with colors

subtitles.original: まだ見ぬ世界はカラフルに染まる
subtitles.english: The world I haven't seen yet will be dyed colorfully

subtitles.original: もっと自由に羽ばたくから
subtitles.english: Because I will flap my wings even more freely

subtitles.original: ずっとあの日感じたままに
subtitles.english: Just as I felt on that day

subtitles.original: そっと伸ばしたこの手の先
subtitles.english: Beyond this hand I gently extended

subtitles.original: 描いた理想が側を越える
subtitles.english: The ideal I drew crosses by me

subtitles.original: やっと見つけた私の色
subtitles.english: I finally found my color

subtitles.original: ずっとずっとずっと描いてくの
subtitles.english: I'll always, always, always keep drawing it

subtitles.original: ありがとう！
subtitles.english: Thank you!

subtitles.original: はい！ というわけで
subtitles.english: Alright! So,

subtitles.original: まずは自己紹介からしたいと思うんですけど
subtitles.english: first of all, I'd like to do a self-introduction.

subtitles.original: あの... みんなわかってる人とわかってない人いるかもしれないから
subtitles.english: Um... since there might be people who know and people who don't,

subtitles.original: 一応説明するんですが
subtitles.english: I'll explain it just in case.

subtitles.original: 「うちうち、うちだよ！」って言ったら
subtitles.english: If I say, "Uchi uchi, uchi da yo!"

subtitles.original: みんな「大神ミオだよ！」って言ってもらったら
subtitles.english: and everyone says, "Ookami Mio da yo!"

subtitles.original: うちの自己紹介が完成するので
subtitles.english: my self-introduction will be complete,

subtitles.original: 言ってもらってもいいですか？
subtitles.english: so could you say it for me?

subtitles.original: それじゃ、いきましょう！
subtitles.english: Then, here we go!

subtitles.original: うちうち、うちだよー！
subtitles.english: Uchi uchi, uchi da yo!

subtitles.original: 大神ミオだよー！
subtitles.english: Ookami Mio da yo!

subtitles.original: わー！
subtitles.english: Waa!

subtitles.original: 本日は大神ミオのソロライブ開催
subtitles.english: Congratulations on holding

subtitles.original: おめでとうございます！
subtitles.english: Ookami Mio's solo live today!

subtitles.original: あ、うちがおめでとうって言われる側だと思うんだけど
subtitles.english: Ah, I think I'm the one who's supposed to be congratulated,

subtitles.original: たぶん
subtitles.english: probably.

subtitles.original: すごいみんな！
subtitles.english: Amazing, everyone!

subtitles.original: え、ソロライブの衣装どうかな？
subtitles.english: Hey, what do you think of my solo live outfit?

subtitles.original: かわいい！ 嬉しい！
subtitles.english: "It's cute!" I'm happy!

subtitles.original: なんとなんと今回、あの6年と...
subtitles.english: Believe it or not, this time, after 6 years...

subtitles.original: まあもうちょっとで7年活動してきて
subtitles.english: well, almost 7 years of activities,

subtitles.original: 尻尾が解放されてるんです！
subtitles.english: my tail has been liberated!

subtitles.original: 見て見て！
subtitles.english: Look, look!

subtitles.original: 今までずっと...
subtitles.english: Up until now, always...
